content.question: How has Lila changed as a result of having “this baby now to think about” (paragraph 4) ?

choices.label: She is determined to take long walks in the fresh air, whereas before she had little concern for her own health.
She is less trusting of others, whereas before she had faith in the basic goodness of all people.
She is cautious in her approach to the shack, whereas before she might have approached it with less hesitation.
She is willing to steal to meet her baby’s needs, whereas before she would have avoided thieves at all costs.

content.answer: She is cautious in her approach to the shack, whereas before she might have approached it with less hesitation.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain the function of a character changing or remaining unchanged.
